definitions: The action of being in a seated position.
The act of posing for a portrait or photograph.
A period of time spent doing a particular activity, especially one that involves being seated.
To be a member of a committee or other official body.
examples: She was sitting on the bench.
The artist spent hours sitting for the portrait.
We had a long sitting at the meeting.
He is sitting on the board of directors.
The house is sitting on a hill.
